name: Tees it Together Pte Ltd.
description: Operator of an online clothing marketplace intended to offer a variety of merchandise. The company's marketplace sells graphics printed products such as t-shirts, bags, pillows, tumblers, hoodies, jackets, mobile cases, and posters on demand, enabling customers to buy products at affordable prices and get them home delivered.
one_liner: Operator of an online clothing marketplace intended to offer a variety of merchandise. The company's marketplace sells graphics printed products such as t-shirts, bags, pillows, tumblers, hoodies, jackets, mobile cases, and posters on demand, enabling customers to buy products at affordable prices and get them home delivered.
